fields.headline: Italy's top shopping outlets
fields.bodyText: The Mall: Leccio-Regello, Florence. Armani, Valentino, Yves Saint Laurent, Loro Piana, Gucci, Fendi. Up to 60 per cent discounts. (Tel: 00 39 055 865 7775) Fashion District: at Valmontone, Rome; Santhia, Vercelli; Bagnolo San Vito, Mantova and soon at Molfetta, Bari. Biggest fashion outlet chain in Italy with prices cut by up to 60 per cent. (www.fashiondistrict.it) Fifty Factory Store: at Meda, Milan, Modena and Aosta. Specialises in sport, leisure brands and children's clothing. (www.fifty.it) Roberto Cavalli: Sesto Fiorentino-Osmannoro, Florence. Discounted clothes and accessories. (www.robertocavallioutlet.it) Space: at Levanella, Montevarchi, Tuscany. Prada, Dolce & Gabbana, Helmut Lang. Preceding season's fashions at half price. (00 39 055 91 901) Tod's-Hogan-Fay: Ascoli Piceno, Le Marche. Past season's fashions up to 70 per cent off. (00 30 0734 87 167) Fendi-Celine-Loewe: Rigano sull'Arno, Florence. Discounts on clothes and handbags of up to 50 per cent.(00 39 055 834 981)
